description: Use the commands API to add keyboard shortcuts that trigger actions in your extension, for example, an action to open the browser action or send a command to the xtension.

name.description: The name of the Extension Command

shortcut.description: The shortcut active for this command, or blank if not active.

functions.name: update
functions.description: Update the details of an already defined command.

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: The new description for the command.

description.description: The new description for the command.

functions.name: reset
functions.description: Reset a command's details to what is specified in the manifest.

functions.name: getAll
functions.description: Returns all the registered extension commands for this extension and their shortcut (if active).

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called to return the registered commands.

events.name: onCommand
events.description: Fired when a registered command is activated using a keyboard shortcut.

parameters.name: tab
parameters.description: Details of the $(ref:tabs.Tab) where the command was activated.

events.name: onChanged
events.description: Fired when a registered command's shortcut is changed.

newShortcut.description: The new shortcut active for this command, or blank if not active.

oldShortcut.description: The old shortcut which is no longer active for this command, or blank if the shortcut was previously inactive.
